name: PhiNesse Brush Small fondation Brush 15
short_description: A small, tapped brush for precise liquid foundation application. This classic foundation brush’s flat, wide tuft is ideal for accurately applying and blending foundation. Its tapered head allows for precise application in hard-to-reach places. It features straight fibers, and can be used with liquid and cream foundations.
long_description: A small, tapped brush for precise liquid foundation application. This classic foundation brush’s flat, wide tuft is ideal for accurately applying and blending foundation. Its tapered head allows for precise application in hard-to-reach places. It features straight fibers, and can be used with liquid and cream foundations.
